themes: business community involvement in arts support
access to affordable or free production services
key_phrases: Grants to visual artists with a demonstrated longstanding commitment to artistic creation
access to low or no cost photographic printing and framing services
Let’s get the business community involved in supporting our artists
barriers_identified: lack of grants for visual artists with longstanding commitment
limited access to affordable or free production services (photographic printing and framing)
solutions_proposed: Provide grants to visual artists with a demonstrated longstanding commitment
Offer access to low or no cost photographic printing and framing services
Involve the business community in supporting artists
